channel.title: Dell Technologies – CSM Installation Wizard
channel.description: Recent content in CSM Installation Wizard on Dell Technologies

item.title: Docs: Release Notes
item.description:
Release Notes - CSM Installation Wizard 1.0.1

New Features/Changes

  • Added support for the CSI-PowerStore, CSI-PowerMax, CSI-PowerScale, CSI-PowerFlex, CSI-Unity and the supported modules for helm installation

Fixed Issues

Known Issues

Issue Workaround
Tolerations required by the Resiliency module are commented out in the generated values.yaml file when Resiliency module is selected If Resiliency is selected, the commented tolerations in the generated values.yaml file must be manually uncommented. The issue has been created at https://github.com/dell/csm/issues/866
